ayah: And establish prayer and give zakah. (2:110)
action: Pray on time today and give charity

ayah: Indeed, Allah loves those who rely upon Him. (3:159)
action: Trust Allah in a decision you’re worried about

ayah: Kind words and forgiveness are better than charity followed by injury. (2:263)
action: Say something kind to someone you argued with

ayah: Help one another in righteousness and piety. (5:2)
action: Help a family member or friend in need today

ayah: Do not walk arrogantly on the earth. (17:37)
action: Practice humility in your interactions today

ayah: Feed the needy and the orphan. (76:8)
action: Give food or assistance to someone in need

ayah: Do not consume one another’s wealth unjustly. (2:188)
action: Check your transactions for fairness and honesty

ayah: (2:83) And recall when We made a covenant with the Children of Israel: “You shall serve none but Allah and do good to parents, kinsmen, orphans and the needy; you shall speak kindly to people, and establish Prayer and give Zakah (Purifying Alms).”
action: Serve Allah alone today, be kind to family and neighbors, help those in need, and speak kindly to people

ayah: And whoever endures patiently and forgives—surely this is a resolve to aspire to.(42:43)
action: Forgive someone who hurt you

ayah: Do not despair of the mercy of Allah. (39:53)
action: Reflect on Allah’s mercy in your life

ayah: ˹O Prophet!˺ Tell the believing men to lower their gaze and guard their chastity. That is purer for them. Surely Allah is All-Aware of what they do.(24:30)
action: Practice modesty and respect in your behavior

ayah: Spend from what We have provided you. (2:267)
action: Give charity even if it’s small today

ayah: Keep your promises and covenants. (17:34)
action: Honor your commitments today

ayah: Help orphans and feed the needy. (107:2-3)
action: Volunteer or donate to a charitable cause

ayah: Do not ridicule others, for they may be better than you. (49:11)
action: Avoid mocking or judging anyone today

ayah: Do not kill the soul which Allah has forbidden. (6:151)
action: Protect life and avoid harmful actions

ayah: O you who have believed, be persistently standing firm in justice, witnesses for Allah, even if it be against yourselves or parents and relatives. (4:135)
action: Be fair in your decisions today

ayah: Spend in the cause of Allah and do not let your own hands throw you into destruction ˹by withholding˺. And do good, for Allah certainly loves the good-doers.(2:195)
action: Do a good deed sincerely today

ayah: And [remember] when your Lord proclaimed, 'If you are grateful, I will surely increase you [in favor]; but if you deny, indeed, My punishment is severe(14:7)
action: List 3 things you are grateful for today

ayah: Consult them in affairs. (3:159)
action: It is out of Allah's mercy that you ˹O Prophet˺ have been lenient with them. Had you been cruel or hard-hearted, they would have certainly abandoned you.
